about_the_game:
Inferni: Hope & Fear is a unique realtime combination of deck builder and last-team-standing combat.



  1. Drag cards from your hand into the world.
  2. Cards become powerful spells that travel the world.
  3. Draft new cards to refine your deck.
  4. Battle alongside your teammate to eliminate every opponent.
  5. Last team standing wins.



There are currently five characters to choose from:

  • The Hunter is a classic glass cannon. Powerful, yet fragile.
  • The Leather Man likes pain and is strongest when low on life.
  • Madame Futura’s spells are all about control.
  • Panacea is a healer of any ailment.
  • Trickster Demon excels at derailing strategy through hand disruption.



Drafting sees you pick new cards mid-game, letting you dynamically react to the strategies of your opponents. Build deadly decks and be prepared to answer your opponents’ cards, in a true evolution of card battlers.



Battle alongside friends and strangers in duos combat. Work together to protect, share cards, heal and revive each other. Inferni is built to be played together… Against the world.

Lore


Become a Wayward Soul, powerful beings who have discovered, nurtured or stolen the power of magic. Use the energies of light and dark as you fight for the World Seed, the key to creation itself, in the Arena of Chaos.

Inferni is set in the aftermath of the collapse of The Realm of Order. Souls of our world sucked into the chaotic otherside. Floating around, lost. Until The Master selected the brightest and most willful souls to become their Waywards.

Join our Discord

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HP24

name: Inferni: Hope & Fear

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 6950 / Intel UHD 630 Integrated Graphics (DirectX 11)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HP24

short_description: Sling cards in the magical mosh pit of Inferni! Realtime 8-player card game that is unlike anything before. Easy to pick up, but with a lifetime of strategic depth. Bring a friend, build decks and ride the leaderboard to the top. Arise as champions, o’Waywards!
